definition: mountain without vegetation/the residence of one's mother/see also 岵[hu4]
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa

sentences.english: Our first stop here, Qimu Island, will definitely attract you.
sentences.chinese: 我们的第一站屺姆岛就一定会吸引你。

sentences.english: It is said that the Five Element Mountains is from Hercules' hand.
sentences.chinese: 传说那巍然屺立的五指山就是黎族祖先大力神的巨手。

definition: mountain covered with vegetation/the residence of one's father/see also 屺[qi3]
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident
a raft made of bamboo or wood/to fell trees/to hew
name of a mountain in Gansu
